text: Aur Allah Taalaa tumharay pass apni kitab mein yeh hukum utaar chuka hai kay tum jab kissi majlis walon ko Allah Taalaa ki aayaton kay sath kufur kertay aur mazaq uratay huye suno to uss majmay mein unn kay sath na betho! Jab tak kay woh iss kay ilawa aur baaten na kerney lagen (werna) tum bhi uss waqt unhi jaisay ho yaqeenan Allah Taalaa tamam kafiron aur sab munafiqon ko jahannum mein jama kerney wala hai
